answers.answer: It ***** very boring! But i keep saying its for my baby girl. I listen to them for the most part bc i would hate to b in the hospital on bed rest. So far we have made it already farther than they thought! Btw ive been on it since 23 weeks and im 29 tomorrow.
Why did you get put on bedrest? I'm getting nervous I might get put on it

Im a high risk already due to being diabetic. Spotted the whole first trimester and my bp started going out of control.  Started showing signs of preeclampsia at 4 1/2 months. I work a stressful job so as much as i tried it kept getting worse till i broke out n rashes and my baby went into distress around 22 weeks. Was measuring small at my echo scan which was at 23 weeks. They pulled me from there n i havent had a problem since. Now she has caught up n weight and not shown any signs of distress. My bp has been amazing...they said it bought me time but they now think imma go around 34 weeks if i continue to take it easy n rest. Sorry its so long :)
I have been cramping for a week straight so my Dr did a fibronectin test and it came back positive.  Which means I may or may not go into preterm labor in the next couple of weeks.

I'm 29 wks will be 30wks on Monday and its been one week since I was put on bed rest for high BP and swelling. I also work a stressful job but this week has been sooooo boring and it really *****. But I have to keep positive because I know its best for my baby boy. Just stick to the doctors orders and with me not being around the work stress has been sort of a relief. I hope all goes well for you.

question: I'm 29 weeks. I was just put on bed rest today. How did you ladies cope with it? and how seriously did you take it? Any tips?
title: Bed Rest
